text: Valentina Aleksandrovna Prudskova (; 27 December 1938 â€“ 23 August 2020) was a Soviet fencer. She won gold in the women's team foil event at the 1960 Summer Olympics and a silver in the same event at the 1964 Summer Olympics. She was born in Yershov, Saratov Oblast. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:People from Saratov Oblast
title: Valentina Prudskova
